name: Nighty Knight: Sweet Dreams
description:
Nighty Knight: Sweet Dreams

  • Play as a Nighty Knight,  protector of dreams, bringer of quality sleep .
  • Enter dreams of troubled sleepers and solve puzzles to bring restful sleep. 
  • Hex based movement, move onto the same tile as the nightmare to dispel it from the dream and complete the level.
  • 15 levels scattered about the overworld.

Controls:
WASD Movement
SPACE Interact
